body:
Its a NTR story, the girlfriend of hero decide to follow the command the antagonist has given(wear that body suit) to get the chance to make him spare the hero`s life,however yhe cloth are build in somekind of thing,make that girl seem these human she familiar with are terrible monster,and antagonist are tell her his kind are trying fight these mosnter to get back the earth,and that woman are just agree,and story ends here.

the decision that
woman make are really not for everyone to understand,but most of people are knowing thing by looking thing,thus it wasn't really silly as outsider might suggest,but I do think it should took more time to make the decision.
